Kalabash documentation
=====================

.. image:: _static/kalabash_logo.png
   :align: center

Overview
--------

Kalabash is a mail hosting and management platform including a modern
and simplified Web User Interface designed to work with `Postfix
<http://www.postfix.org>`_ and `Dovecot <http://www.dovecot.org>`_.

And it is extensible by nature and comes with a lot of additional extensions:

+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
|Name                                                     |Description              |Documentation                                         |
|                                                         |                         |                                                      |
|                                                         |                         |                                                      |
|                                                         |                         |                                                      |
+=========================================================+=========================+======================================================+
|`kalabash-amavis                                          |A frontend for `Amavis   |https://kalabash-amavis.readthedocs.io                 |
|<https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-amavis>`_            |<http://www.amavis.org>`_|                                                      |
|                                                         |                         |                                                      |
|                                                         |                         |                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
|`kalabash-pfxadmin-migrate                                |A tool to migrate from   |https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-pfxadmin-migrate   |
|<https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-pfxadmin-migrate>`_  |Postfixadmin             |                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
|`kalabash-postfix-autoreply                               |Away message editor      |https://kalabash-postfix-autoreply.readthedocs.io      |
|<https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-postfix-autoreply>`_ |(postfix compatible)     |                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
|`kalabash-radicale                                        |A frontend for `Radicale |https://kalabash-radicale.readthedocs.io               |
|<https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-radicale>`_          |<http://radicale.org>`_  |                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
|`kalabash-sievefilters                                    |A Sieve filters (rules)  |https://kalabash-sievefilters.readthedocs.io           |
|<https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-sievefilters>`_      |editor                   |                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
|`kalabash-webmail                                         |A simple webmail         |https://kalabash-webmail.readthedocs.io                |
|<https://github.com/amonak/kalabash-webmail>`_           |                         |                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
